alert.note: Alert for Jones (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 12 at 10:56PM MDT until June 13 at 8:45AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central South Dakota, including the following county, Jones. * WHEN...Until 600 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1155 PM CDT, the public reported heavy rain in the warned area due to thunderstorms. Flooding is already occurring. Between 1 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Murdo, Draper, Okaton, Westover and Capa. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
